attributes.action: Restore the right for Police Officers to take Industrial Action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a Police officer with over 27 years  service.The majority of it spent on Patrol Duties

THE GOVERNMENTS REFUSAL TO HONOUR THE INDEPENDANTS PAY BODYS RECOMMENDATION TO BACK DATE OUR RECENT PAY INCREASE IS THE FINAL STRAW.

The Police for years now have been under increasing pressure from Government.Our hands are tied behind our backs.Targets,Red Tape,Inafective Sentencing,lack of support have all served to put the morale of the majority of Officers in this Country at an all time low.
Most officers do not want to resort to taking Industrial Action but if the Government insist on treating the Police like any other business then please at least give us the comparable rights and conditions to those workers in business.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
